title: Principles of Analysis
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of analysis. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Principles of Ethics
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in ethics. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Systems
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of systems. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Thermodynamics
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in thermodynamics. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Advanced Design
description: Comprehensive study of design with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Controls
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in controls. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.

title: Innovation
description: Advanced exploration of innovation covering current research and industry practices.

title: Advanced Project Management
description: In-depth analysis of project management principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
